legal_text.description:
Describes any legal requirements for the hotel. If an advertiser has a single policy across all bookings, return
the advertiser's legal text here (e. g. Terms of Service and Privacy Policy).

checkin_date.description: The check-in date of the user in YYYY-MM-DD.

receipt.description: Information about the pricing on the reservation.

confirmation_url.description:
Deep link to the reservation confirmation page. The confirmation URL is displayed to the user after a booking has
been confirmed.
Since this URL is displayed to the user, it has to redirect to a page owned by the booked property which
displays any relevant confirmation codes, and confirms the dates, rooms and final price for the booking.
Please provide an empty string, if the confirmation page should be hosted by trivago.

partner_reference.description:
The advertiser's unique identifier for this hotel. In a "/booking_submit" request this should be the same as
in the request.

checkout_date.description: The check-out date of the user in YYYY-MM-DD.

reservation_id.description: The advertiser's unique id for this reservation. Must be used as booking_id in the tracking pixel.
